titleStmt.title: Alexander Girardi (born Graz, Dec. 5, 1850; died Vienna, April 20, 1918)

body.head: Alexander Girardi (born Graz, Dec. 5, 1850; died Vienna, April 20, 1918)

div.p: Alexander Girardi (born Graz, Dec. 5, 1850; died Vienna, April 20, 1918), one of Austria's most celebrated actors around the turn of the 19th century, who worked at the Theater an der Wien 1874-96, at the Carlstheater 1896/97, and at the Deutsches Volkstheater in Vienna 1898-1900. He was primarily a comic actor, and worked also in operetta. He retired from the stage in 1914.
